titleStmt.title: Logica elenctica sive Summa controversiarum, quæ circa materiam, & præcepta logicæ, agitari solent In qua etiam novæ aliquot quæstiones tractantur. Authore Thoma Goveano, M.A. Verbi Divini ministro.
titleStmt.author: T. G. (Thomas Gowan), 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: excudebat Jos. Ray, sumptibus ejusdem; prostant venales apud Eliph. Dobson, and insignia Stationariorum in vico vulgò dicto Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: "Elementa logicæ paucis aphorismis comprehensa" has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church College, Oxford.

person.persName: Jos. Ray, sumptibus ejusdem; prostant venales apud Eliph. Dobson, and insignia Stationariorum
